name: Bearphemoth
description:
In Bearphemoth you play as a small Teddy who try's to help his Cat friend.

What is wrong with Cat, will Cat be happy again?

Only you can help and try your best!

Controlls, as usual but F is interact.

Follow Developement: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0FQ-TSX-ftGIc5jvovQlIQ
